org.gearvrf

Interface GVRShaderMaps

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GVRMaterialMap, GVRPostEffectMap

    public interface GVRShaderMaps
    The API shared by GVRMaterialMap and GVRPostEffectMap. A GVRShaders implementation specifies a shader via an opaque type, and contains named values. These names are not necessarily the same as the names of the uniforms in the shader program: the methods of this interface let you map names from materials to programs.

    GVRMaterialShaderManager implements GVRShaderManagers GVRMaterialMap implements GVRShaderMaps GVRMaterial implements GVRShaders
    GVRPostEffectShaderManager implements GVRShaderManagers GVRPostEffectMap implements GVRShaderMaps GVRPostEffect implements GVRShaders

      • addTextureKey

        void addTextureKey(java.lang.String variableName,
                   java.lang.String key)
        Adds a link from a texture in a GVRShaders to a GL program.
        Parameters:
        variableName - The variable name in the GL program.
        key - The texture's key in the GVRShaders.

        key - The float's key in the post effect data.
